Package org.spongepowered.api.effect.particle

Interface ParticleEffect.Builder

All Superinterfaces:
AbstractBuilder<ParticleEffect>, Builder<ParticleEffect,ParticleEffect.Builder>, CopyableBuilder<ParticleEffect,ParticleEffect.Builder>, DataBuilder<ParticleEffect>, ResettableBuilder<ParticleEffect,ParticleEffect.Builder>
Enclosing interface:
ParticleEffect
public static interface ParticleEffect.Builder extends Builder<ParticleEffect,ParticleEffect.Builder>, CopyableBuilder<ParticleEffect,ParticleEffect.Builder>, DataBuilder<ParticleEffect>
Represents a builder to create a ParticleEffect.
